name: Steadee
tag_list: productivity, tasks, projects, task, project, task-management, project-management, drag-and-drop
overview:
Steadee is a productivity improvement tool for small businesses, which lets you easily schedule tasks, projects and events.

Benefits:

Very easy to use Create, edit, prioritize tasks & projects with only one click One line input Only necessary functions with intuitive workflow Pleasant and easy interface

Options:

Create, edit, prioritize tasks & projects Delegate tasks Make reports Chats & discussions Sync option Access Steadee from any source You can be in control and accomplish what you want to accomplish with Steadee!
